text: Arau koraa, ‘satya tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa (ahiche), seye yara iccha si imana anaka arau yara iccha si kupharai karaka’. Niscaya ami yalimasakalara babe prastuta raakhicho agni, yara praaciraborae sihamtaka paraibestana karai raakhiche. Sihamte paniya bicaraile sihamtaka diya ha’ba galita dhatura darae paniya, yito sihamtara mukhamandala dagdha karaiba, e'ito bara nikrsta paniya! Arau jahannama kimana ye nikrsta bisraamasthala
